attributes.background: I had a pacemaker/defibrillator fitted and dvla said it's a permanent bar and revoked my group 2 vehicles license. My cardiologist states after 6months there's no reason why I shouldn't be able to drive group 2vehicles.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government or Parliament to change the rules around pacemakers and driving if that's something you would like to see happen.
